name: Roll of the Chamber
description:
*EPILEPSY WARNING*

Description:

This is a game of strategy and chance. Do you take the shot with less lethality, or wait and risk dying?

How To Play:

This is a game of chance - a modified version of Russian roulette - where the player and an opponent will attempt to kill each other.  

The player and the opponent will both have 3 chances to pull the trigger of a 6 shot revolver on the other, but the player gets to decide who shoots after each turn (unless one of them runs out of chances). 

Select the bottom right hand for the player to shoot, and the top left hand for the opponent to shoot.  

"Isn't it common sense to pull the trigger first?" You may ask, but the catch is that the cylinder is not shuffled after each turn - chances of the revolver firing increases with each Roll of the Chamber!

Wasting a bullet is considered a sin in  these times and you will be executed. 

Your goal is to kill as many enemies as possible and may luck be on your side...
